_sText:
A bud of mine gave me this idea to make a race out of mg_boulderdash. So as you can see, i did it. 

Blue side is the CT's,
Red side is the T's. 

The players try to make it to the top without getting killed by a boulder. If they do that, they get teleported to the top of the middle tower and push the magic button to kill the other team. Congrats, you win!

Thanks to flapjax for hosting the map during testing.

ENJOY!

Try to make it to the top without getting sqaushed by the boulders! There are slits to jump into on the way up. At the top is an awp to kill the opposing team!

map by: keto
idea from: MXC (http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=4xCCmSds1PM)

Map by: Ragnara
===============
-   Contact: Gamebanana: Ragnara
-   Feedback & Testing: Tranquility Gaming Community
 
Objective
=========
 Your mission is to slay the dragon. There is a small obtacle course which is extremely easy where the fastest player can get special weapons that will help fight the dragon.

If you beat the dragon on hard mode. You unlock Hardcore mode which is much harder than the hard mode.

Teamplay is recommended on this map

Special Weapons
===============
-  Pikachu
-  Colorful Penis
-  Flaming Penis
-  Health Regenerator
-  Elemental Aura

Version 11 Changes
==================
-  Improved FPS at spawn (180 before 220 now)
-  Little touches

Version 10 Changes
==================
-  Added 64 Spawns
-  Little touches
-  Kill reward

Version 9 Changes
=================
-  Fps Optimized
-  Reduced the ammount of particles
-  Removed the blood for less lagg

Version 8 Changes
=================
-  Added new textures
-  New weapon added

Version 7 Changes
=================
-  Lots of bugfixes
-  Instead of falling down you get teleported down
-  People have a chance now to kill the dragon on hard at least

Version 6 Changes
=================
-  Reduced map size
 
Version 5 Changes
=================
-  Removed hostages for round end
-  Survivors simply die after killing the boss
 
Version 4 Changes
=================
-  Fixed a bug when people

You DO NOT have the right to take credit for our map.

mg_bombman
A simple minigame type map where ALL TERRORISTS GOT BOMB. Counter-Terrorists must defuse ONE BOMB to win, but they must do it fast, they are starting at elevator, its moving slowly to bombsite. Thanks for playing, have fun!

New version with 32 spawns!!!.
==============================

Found a way to optimice entity count by huge numbers.
Eddicts number reduced from 1950 to 900 which allows 32 player spawns
Thx to a RL friend for this hint
I hope this version does not crash servers

There was a 32 spawns version months ago but it crashed servers and had a stupid bug where players couldnt plant a bomb anymore

Changes
------------------
- Bugfixes
- Optimications
- Fixed a Bug where people couldnt place a Bomb anymore
- simpler area dmg detectors (boxes instead of balls > better performance)
- throw distance increased

How to play
------------------

Aim is to kill the enemy team
With E you throw bombs
When looking on the ground while pressing E
you lay a bomb
You can kick a layed bomb by running towards the bomb
There are boxes that can be broken to aquire amazing power ups

Power ups
------------------

- Extrabomb.......you can lay 1 more bomb at same time
- Firepower.......Aoe radius increases
- Health..........You get 25 hp
- Superhealth.....Full heal and HP cap to 150
- Speed...........you run faster

### Bomb Types

- Icebomb..........Slows
- Firebomb.........Molotov Coctail
- Electrobomb......Stuns
- Windbomb.........Throws you in the air  **REMOVED**

After 3 minutes of gametime sudden death starts
which cause the lava to rise

- 16 CT Spawns
- 16 T Spawns

Current Bugs Statement
------------------

##### Players unable to lay a bomb
FIXED!!!!

Post comment

**This map requires a Noblock script**
**Recomended rate config**
cl_cmdrate 33 (higher value will require more rate)
cl_updaterate 33 
rate 25000 (or higher)

Current version v1c (stable version)

The objective of this map is to win a race driving a boat.
The race has 2 laps, when a player wins the race the enemy team will die.
Players cannont kill enemies using any weapon.
Each team can control 8 boats, players that cannot drive boats can see the race choose background music and try to break enemy boats with grenades.

The boat is driven using WASD, at faster speed the boat will spin less, as any other vehicle break before taking a curve.
The boat has a little problem: boats deviates to one side at high speeds.
Remember that te boat is breakable, avoid any impact against walls or other boats, also avoid grenades.
-----------------------------------------------------------
Changelog:

--v1--

First release.

--v1b--

-Disabled collisions between boats, this decreases lag and glitches in race.
-Now boats are blocked in the spawnboxes this prevents boats to start moving without driver when damaged.
-One more bridge for spectator players.
-Small map optimizations.

--v1c--

-Fixed client and server crash after CS:S OrangeBox update.

**Recomended rate config**
cl_cmdrate 33 (higher value will require more rate)
cl_updaterate 33
rate 25000 (or higher)

Current version v1 (beta)

The objective of this map is to win a race driving a boat.
The race has 2 laps, when a player wins the race the enemy team will die.
Players cannont kill enemies using any weapon.
Each team can control 8 boats, players that cannot drive boats can see the race choose background music and try to break enemy boats with grenades.

The boat is driven using WASD, at faster speed the boat will spin less, as any other vehicle break before taking a curve.
Remember that te boat is breakable, avoid any impact against walls or other boats, also avoid grenades.
If the driver suicides then the boat will break, if all boats where broken during the race or any player drives boats then everyone will die.

------------------------
Changelog:

--v1--

First release.

--v1b--

-Disabled collisions between boats, this decreases lag and glitches in race.
-Now boats are blocked in the spawnboxes this prevents boats to start moving without driver when damaged.
-One more bridge for spectator players.
-Small map optimizations.

INTRODUCTION
 Finally. Finally the day came, when I released a map on FPSBanana. Since in my opinion Counter-Strike: Source sucks, I only play mini game and soccer maps, which is really fun for me. With a lot of mini game playing experience, we tried to make a map, which is fun and is realistic. I hope, that you all can share the fun of this map with us!
INSTALLATION
 Just put the mg_boatrace_scramble.bsp into your CS:S map folder, which is located at: ?:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\*STEAM NAME*\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\ or similar folder structures.
ABOUT THE MAP
 The goal of the map is to win the boatrace. Since there are only 6 boats to drive with, we built a bar and a bowling lane for you. But if you don't watch out, you will wake up in hospital. Boat controls: W,A,S,D - Steering MOUSE2 - Motor shutdown
LAST NOTES
 If you find any bug, feel free to contact us. If you like this map, please rate it with 10/10 and add it to favorites. Oh, and please upload it to your servers! Thanks!

made by iffa
http://youtube.com/user/1337iffamies

General Info:

The map use mpbhop, which allow multiply players to jump at same time, I know this have been a problem on a lot of MG servers

The level is much more advanced then the most other MG bhop maps.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
In-Game Info:

When you are jumping you ain't protected form Fall dmg. but as soon as you fail you will get your health back again.

There is 1 secret, that allow you to get a scout and get to the higtes platform in the middle of the arena.

Each weapon have its own spawn location in the arena.

There is grenades and pistol around the Arena.

If you complete the map you will get 200 HP and be able to choose from a lot of defriend weapons.

The map has no top, cuz i dont see the points of running around almost unkillable.

The map plays a random song each round. 
There is 3 Songs, all made by Archie.
Archie's Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/buckallponyhaters69

Songlist:
Archie - Fallen Dreams (edit Mix)       _edited by me_,
Archie - Praise The Sun (original Mix),
Daniel Ingram - I've Got to Find a Way (Archie Remix)

Hope you enjoy the map.

I finally fixed all the glitches from v1. Basically, the farther you get from bhopping, the better weapons you get. The weapon order is; knife, glock, deagle, mp5, ak47, awp. 

UPDATES
- Fixed the "Top" glitch.
- Made it so guns can't be spammed.
- Made and "AFK Killer"
- Made a "Kill Button"

UPDATES for V3
- Made it so more than one person can be on bhop platform  at a time.
- Fixed it so you can't shoot each other through the boxes after failing.

On this map I am using my Skills-System. I did it for Kirby and he'll propably use it in mg_mario_battle.

I like this Skills-System so i did a small map with it.

I created this map in about 9 hours.. It looks good and I think everything works good too! You have only a knife on this map.

About:

You are a Ninja! Yes you are! On spawn you can choose your skill and after 30 seconds everybody'll be teleported to an arena.

**Classes:**

Running Ninja.

- Fast (80 hp)
- Very Fast (60 hp)
- Fast Like Hell (15 hp)

Shy Ninja.

- Gravity - (80 hp)
- Gravity - - (60 hp)
- Gravity - - - (15 hp)

Fat Ninja.

- Slow (135 hp)
- Very Slow (200 hp)

Nudist Ninja.

- Stealth + (80 hp)
- Stealth + + (60 hp)

Junior Ninja.

- Normal (100 hp)

Enjoy!

First off, map file is pretty large for a minigame, i know. but this map has custom textures and models, and i dont think its worth sacrificing them for a smaller file as they add alot to the map.

Round starts with T's on the seawall and CT's in the transports. a delay is given for T's to equip and man MG's and mortars to repel the advancing CT's.
weapon and ammo distribution is deliberate, as a balancing thing.
CT's will be auto killed if they remain in the transport or move beside/behind the transports.
T's will be auto killed if they try to get on the beach.
CT's win by getting one man to touch the pole in front of t spawn.


I added some sounds as the transport doors open. when i was testing it i felt it lacked some ambiance so i added some bullet effects, but this is v1 so they can be removed if necessary. also i havent tested this with lots of other people, just bots, so im not sure on the balance yet. I'm sure lots of players are needed to do this map justice though.

please let me know about any bugs or possible improvements you may notice!

This is a Beach Volley Ball Mini Game I created myself, along with the physics settings changes that occur int he map. This will work on any server, with any settings.

6 Points per win, Ball starts on CT side and Terrorists can get into position before ct start.

This map contains Custom Models as well as Custom textures and 60 player Spawns... 30 Per Team

Soundscapes, Visual effects, and a Tallyboard display the points each team has. This map is relatively small in file size and big on visuals. I hope you all like it

****CTS SERVE FIRST**** 
JOIN THE CT TEAM TO TEST MAP BY YOURSELF

Mg_beachrun_v2

Map by: DisConNecTed/DisCounTed (I use two names)

Some of you may have come across a map called "mg_beachrun," one of my earliest maps that I never finished. Well, somehow it got across servers so I decided to add some things to it and actually have some mg elements in it:

-Added a fence which CT's need to break
-Made it harder for CT's by not directly giving them weapons, instead they have to go looking around the beach
-Optomized a bit
-Deleted the scouts in bunkers, now they are in the trench and in a foxhole type thing that I created out of bordem
-Reduced fog
-Made it a lot lighter and easier to see
-Added some backround noise 
-The secret awp was left untouched
-Made the beach a bit longer
-Fixed the water not being visible to some people
-Added smokegrenades and flashbangs to CT's to help deal with campers that camp the top of the ropes
-Fixed the bug where you could climb up the cliff behind the rocks without using a rope

Not my best work, and you can't fire cannons sorry guys D: !!! Maybe I can get around to doing that in v3... I was kind of aiming for the look of Utah beach, but I failed at that and now it looks like something you'd find in a snowglobe... If you want to modify this map in anyway, or use some thing as a prefab you can go right ahead (so long as you give me credit as the original owner).

Made by Thomas Braspenning
ingame name: [D.s] Che
links: Deathseekers.co.uk 

a minnigame server: Warm Cup of Tea minnigames: 217.146.93.123:27045


Map:

T's have to camp with machine guns in the towers while the ct's try to get to the gate. they only have a mac10

When the ct's reach the gates they can choose between airstrike and awp. When you press airstrike everyone in the bunkers will die. And the rest gets sniped down.The airstrike kills all the t's

Newer version of battleslider, older version can be found here: http://gamebanana.com/maps/160856

Differences: 
  • The map now has more variety of weapons
  • Now has a random difficulty mod
  • New music

Basically the objective is to eliminate the enemy team with either a p90, deagle or a knife (which will be chosen randomly) whilst sliding.

There's more weapons scattered around the map too. If you make it to the end you will be to be able to kill as many people as you can.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04F4xlWSFh0

A fun minigames map. You have to rush to the doorway in order to choose the map. There's seven different types of maps you can choose from:

- snipe
- knife
- nade
- dodgeball
- weapons
- slide
- race

Enjoy!

Oh, and for servers, you have to turn on "NO BLOCK(for all)" and "NO FLASH (for the dodgeball)"

Mg_battle_in_space is a funny gravity minigame

Teams starts in own bases with buyzones.
Outside of base ground is like trampoline (you cant normally step it, you must be in a fly or on flying "eight number".

If you will pickup AK47 or M4A1 in base, you will fly LIKE A BROOM!

Plot:

This map is minigame map and the aim is to bhop as long as you can go. After deveryone has got weapon you will be teleported to arena where you can kill each other. In the middle of arena is nade spawner.

If you are so good bunnyhopper, you might get to the end and choose one of the three doors with different weapons. Also you will get some extra health.


Instructions:

1. Download the .rar-file (Around 2 MB, unpacked +10MB)
2. Extract anywhere
3. Move the .bsp to your maps folder.
Usually located at:
C:\Program Files\Steam\Steamapps\Steamname\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps
4. Play.

The is final version.

Other:
The inspiration to this map came from mg_bhop_battle made by xGrandx. After playing that map I wanted to create something with same idea.

Functional and beautiful soccer/football map for minigame servers.
New additions:
1) Multiple Goals - now one team must score 2 goals to win
2) NO-KNIFE kills - now nobody can kill others with knife. Finally, the game is fun.
3) Winners cant throw down guns
5) Monitor, which shows the game + advertising
6) Lighting + HDR
7) Real ball

Do not edit and/or reupload this map. Send any questions/feedback to: Pellevoice@gmail.com

This is a map created for another PlagueFest event, a contest actually. Where it's about creating a map similar to mg_lego_builder created by Epic Jonny a.k.a Robin.

I copied nothing from his .vmf in any way, i created everything from scratch by myself where i also added more features and additions to my liking.

These features includes:

  • 64 player spawn
  • randomized game modes
  • free building
  • 5 different building roles
  • 20 avalible builder slots
  • 10 different building pieces
  • 5 different skins for each building piece
  • total replay-ability
  • randomized game perks (such as hp, speed, lowgrav)

  • randomized game events/suprises

  • APOCALYPSE MODE - meteors rain down while everything explodes, breaking all the pieces they touch, other modes and perks might or might not be mixed up, it's all a free-for-all random frenzy!

This was created over the course of about 4-5 days, along with some testing on the PlagueFest server. I hope it'll be some amusement for you all.

Enjoy!

Fighting with swords,maces,staffs..
And win the match with Excalibur! :D
